mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element Location

Documentation:

Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry. Could be a clinical site, community site, or a mobile facility.

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • EntityOrRole
        • Entity
          • Location

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      OperationalStatus

      The operational status covers operation values most relevant to beds (but can also apply to rooms/units/chairs/etc. such as an isolation unit/dialysis chair). This typically covers concepts such as contamination, housekeeping, and other activities like maintenance.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      OperationalStatus
      0..1
      Name

      The name as plain unstructured or semi-structured text.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Name
      1..1
      Alias

      A list of alternate names the subject is or was known as.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Alias
      0..*
      CommentOrDescription

      A text note containing additional details, explanation, description, comment, or summarization.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      CommentOrDescription
      0..1
      Mode

      The manner in which the item should be interpreted. For example, mode could indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific item or a class of items, an actual or potential event, a working list or a snapshot of a historical list, etc.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      Mode
      0..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/location-mode (REQUIRED)
      Type

      A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      Type
      1..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType (EXTENSIBLE)
      ContactPoint

      An electronic means of contacting an organization or individual.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ContactPoint
      0..*
      Address

      An address expressed using postal conventions (as opposed to GPS or other location definition formats). This data type may be used to convey addresses for use in delivering mail as well as for visiting locations and which might not be valid for mail delivery. There are a variety of postal address formats defined around the world. (Source: HL7 FHIR).
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Address
      0..1
      PhysicalType

      Physical form of the location, e.g. building, room, vehicle, road.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      PhysicalType
      0..1
      Geoposition

      The location on the surface of the Earth, described by a latitude and longitude (and optional altitude).
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Geoposition
      0..1
      ManagingOrganization

      The organization that manages a patient, activity, facility, document, or service provision.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ManagingOrganization
      1..1
      HoursOfOperation

      What days/times during a week is this location usually open.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      HoursOfOperation
      0..*
      AvailabilityExceptions

      A description of when the locations opening ours are different to normal, e.g. public holiday availability. Succinctly describing all possible exceptions to normal site availability as detailed in the opening hours Times.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      AvailabilityExceptions
      0..1
